articles.description: Listen to 5 Live commentary and follow live text updates from six Premier League games, including Newcastle v Tottenham and Man City v Luton.
articles.title: Premier League: Build-up as Newcastle host Spurs in first of six games

articles.description: Listen to radio commentary and follow live text updates from day three of The Masters from Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia, USA.
articles.title: The Masters LIVE: Day Three - radio commentary, leaderboard as Scheffler, Woods and McIlroy head out

articles.description: Watch live coverage and follow live text updates as Ireland host Wales at Virgin Media Park, Cork in the Women's Six Nations
articles.title: Women's Six Nations: Ireland v Wales - watch & text

articles.description: Follow live text updates as Harlequins face Bordeaux-Begles, Leinster host defending champions La Rochelle and Northampton Saints take on the Bulls for a place in the semi-finals.
articles.title: Champions Cup quarter-finals: Bordeaux-Begles v Harlequins

articles.description: Follow live text coverage as Mallorca host La Liga leaders Real Madrid before Cadiz face Barcelona.
articles.title: La Liga: Mallorca host leaders Real Madrid

articles.description: Manchester City move top of the Premier League for at least a day with a dominant victory over struggling Luton Town.
articles.title: Man City thrash Luton to go top of table

articles.description: I Am Maximus storms clear to win the Grand National at Aintree for jockey Paul Townend and trainer Willie Mullins.
articles.title: Grand National result: I Am Maximus wins at Aintree ahead of Delta Work

articles.description: Emma Raducanu withstands a late surge from France's Diane Parry to secure Great Britain's place in the Billie Jean King Cup Finals.
articles.title: Billie Jean King Cup qualifying: Emma Raducanu and Katie Boulter earn GB win over France

articles.description: England continued their perfect start to the Women's Six Nations as they swept to a comprehensive win away in Scotland.
articles.title: England continue perfect start as Scots suffer

articles.description: Bayern Munich delay Bayer Leverkusen's Bundesliga title celebrations for at least one more day as the defending champions earn victory over Cologne.
articles.title: Bayern win delays Leverkusen title celebrations
